mainText:
Apple, under the leadership and vision of Steve Jobs, has changed the  
world as we know it.
In the world of Digital Filmmaking, we have pioneered through  
countless advances with the aid of Apple hardware, software and  
networking.
Steve Jobs will be missed by his collective digital family, not just  
because of the toys he gave us, but for the vision he shared and  
inspired us with.
header: The world has lost a Leader and a Visionary, but Steve will remain an Icon and a Legend.
author: Greg
